test.algorithms.search

Class AStarSearch<V extends State,E extends WeightedEdge>

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.algorithms.search.AStarSearch<V,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - - Vertex type, must extend the State class
    E - - Edge type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    InformedSearch<V,E>

    public class AStarSearch<V extends State,E extends WeightedEdge>
extends java.lang.Object
implements InformedSearch<V,E>
    Implementation of the informed search algorithm A*. The graph must be fully defined as a JUNG Graph, handling implicit graphs with successor generators may be too far out of scope for this project as it is aiming to allow users quick scripts to

    • Nested Class Summary

        public java.util.List<V> tracePath(java.util.HashMap<V,V> path,
                                   V node)
        Description copied from interface: InformedSearch
        Builds a list of the nodes that were traversed by backtracking from the goal
        Specified by:
        tracePath in interface InformedSearch<V extends State,E extends WeightedEdge>
        Parameters:
        path - - A hashmap indicating child(key) and parent(value)
        node - - The node to trace back from.
        Returns:
        - A list indicating the order nodes were traversed, or a null list if the root is not in the graph.
